modMetaData.name: Grand Rivers Reforked
modMetaData.author: Kobe Riddle, Meltup
modMetaData.description:
Grand Rivers Reforked: Expanding the might of Rimworld's waterways once again, again!.

Grand Rivers Reborn fork with added "small river" with the width of the Vanilla "river", and the creek returned to its vanilla width.

Original idea by 101VaultBoy.
